title: What Led Me to You
description: After graduation, I thought I would have the life I had always dreamed of. But like everything else, it was taken away from me. The people I trusted the most, betrayed me. So, I took the pieces of my broken heart and left Las Vegas. New state, new surroundings, new beginnings.I was always told, when one door closes, another one opens. Taking the job as a nanny for Alex and his daughter was my new beginning. A fresh start and the closure I desperately needed. Except, just when I think I can move on and enjoy life, my past comes knocking. Itâ€™s ready to take everything away from me, again.I thought I was safe and I thought I could start my life over.I was wrong.What Led Me to You is an 80,000+ STANDALONE book with suspense, romance and has a HEA.
author: Lynn Rhys
